stimulusHtml: The way the kaiser and Bismarck are portrayed is best explained by the

features.html:
German poster of Kaiser Wilhelm I and Chancellor Otto von Bismarck, 1888

Private Collection/Bridgeman Images

Caption reads: “We Germans fear God and nobody else in this world.”

choicesHtml: turn away from realistic forms of visual art in Europe
growing importance of public education in most European countries
increasing political and diplomatic tensions in Europe in the late nineteenth century
development of racial ideologies influenced by Social Darwinism
